p: We examined changes in myocardial histopathology by H&E staining ( Figure 2a). On both d 7 and 14, there were no evident pathological changes in the control group, while VMC and VMC+Sham groups showed severe injuries accompanied by cellular infiltration and necrosis. Vagotomy exacerbated the extent of cellular infiltration and necrosis in VMC mice ( p< 0.05). The pathological damage was significantly reduced in VMC+Vag mice with pnu282987 treatment ( p< 0.05). Likewise, pnu282987 administration in VMC mice exhibited smaller and more limited foci of cellular infiltration and necrosis ( p< 0.05). ( Figure 2b)
